sentences.cn: 月光透过树叶撒在地面.

sentences.en: Moonlight softens our faults; all shabbiness dissolves into shadow.
sentences.cn: 月光淡化了我们的各种缺点, 所有的卑微都化解为依稀朦胧的阴影.

sentences.en: Our meeting took place by moonlight.
sentences.cn: 我们是在月光下会面的.

sentences.en: The castle was bathed in moonlight.
The lake glistens in the moonlight.
The moonlight gleamed on the water.
sentences.cn: 月光照在水面上泛起粼粼波光。

sentences.en: The moonlight poured in through the windows.
sentences.cn: 月光透过窗户泻入室内.

sentences.en: The moonlight streamed in through the window.
sentences.cn: 月光透过窗户射了进来.

sentences.en: The operation was code-named Moonlight Sonata.
sentences.cn: 这次行动的代号是“月光奏鸣曲”。

sentences.en: The sea glinted in the moonlight.
sentences.cn: 月色中海面上波光粼粼。

sentences.en: These workers moonlight to live on a higher plane.
sentences.cn: 这些工人靠兼差来提高生活水平.

sentences.en: They started strolling down the dusty road in the moonlight.
sentences.cn: 在月光下他们开始沿着满是尘土的路漫步。

sentences.en: They walked along the road in the moonlight.
sentences.cn: 他们在月光下沿路散步。

sentences.en: We dance on the green, dine at the hermitage, and wander in the woods by moonlight.
sentences.cn: 我们在绿茵上跳舞, 在僻静的住所晚餐, 在月光下漫步于森林中.

sentences.en: We went to the temple of Atlantis and saw it by moonlight.
sentences.cn: 我们去了亚特兰蒂斯神殿，在月光下游览了一番。

words.tran_cn: 参与夜袭之人；非法酿酒或贩酒的人；兼差之人；月光团员

trans.tran_en: to have a second job in addition to your main job, especially without the knowledge of the government tax department
